mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT mNo, grade,title, poster FROM movieList NATURAL JOIN theaterList WHERE theater=#{tname } ORDER BY mNo ASC
SELECT movietime FROM theaterList NATURAL JOIN movieList WHERE theater=#{tname} AND title=#{title}
SELECT tNo,local FROM theaterList WHERE tNo=1 OR tNo=82 OR tNo=163 OR tNo=244 OR tNo=352 ORDER BY tNo ASC
SELECT DISTINCT theater FROM theaterList WHERE local=#{local}
SELECT DISTINCT theaterNo FROM theaterList NATURAL JOIN movieList WHERE theater=#{tname} AND title=#{title}
SELECT seat FROM reserveList NATURAL JOIN theaterList NATURAL JOIN movieList WHERE rDate=to_date(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND theater=#{theater} AND title=#{title}
